name: Tiny Traffic (Virtual Turtle Games)
description:
Tiny Traffic is a realtime puzzle game in which you have limited control-modifiers. Play fast, play smart, or you'll literally run out of controls!

In the game you must direct one or more cars to a finish-tile. You can manipulate the level using control-modifiers. So it's quite easy? Oh no! We made sure you never have enough modifiers to finish a level up-front ;) You have to switch modifiers around while the cars drive, and really think ahead.

Made for the GMTK 2020 gamejam, with the theme 'Out of control.'

Created by: Steven Kuperus (Virtual Turtle Games) and Thomas Rebel (Pengon.)

Known bugs:

* Unfortunately the dragging of modifiers can be a bit buggy. Drag rather slowly to avoid problems.

Credits:

 Everything is self-made, with the exception of:

* Game/Menu music: Youtube Audio Library

* Sound effects (although heavily edited): Youtube Audio Library

* Font: DaFont
